title: Champions Of Runeterra welcomes you to visit!

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
https://i.gyazo.com/000bf03c5236219ba56b807405f80357.png

***Champions of Runeterra is a League of Legends lore based gaming community that welcomes friendly players of all kinds!***

Though we are an **ENGLISH ONLY** server we have a wide range of players from many regions! With 800+ members, our fast growing community would love to have you visit and see what we are all about!


The community revolves around the lore of Runeterra. **As a member you can choose which city you want to represent as a league of legends champion!** 

Every champion has a place to fit amongst all the wonderful cities of Runeterra, from Bandle city, Mount Targon, Demacia, The Void  and many others!

Each city has its own events from 1v1 tournaments to large scale city battles and competitions, there's always something exciting to participate in for our city bound citizens.

https://i.gyazo.com/f78f086244af8394ba1fd3a40ddc73e4.png

**Champions of Runeterra also hosts full server events for the wonderful members who don't want to represent a city or have not decided where they will fit in yet! There are many benefits of being a member even if you're not apart of a city! A few of the wonderful things Champions of Runeterra does are...
**

- Weekly Server Tournaments 
- Movie Times!
- Trivia Events!
- Karaoke!
- Giveaways and Lotteries!
- and much much more!

***If you're looking for a place to find people to play with that is an inviting and non toxic environment then look no further!***

https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/7b/Runeterra_Crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20161117185203

Come and visit Champions of Runeterra and see for yourself! We welcome you and hope you join this wonderful venture into building a great community with us!

https://discord.gg/2PHT7rK

replies.body: Friendly and helpful people. Would recommend people to join. Cheers :)
Looking forward to playing some games with your guys hope to see you in the Rift
:D I look forward to the chance to have some wonderful OCE players join our community! Hopefully we can expand and have lots of fun events and tournaments for everyone!
Looking forward to making some new friends! come join us!
:D Hope to see some awesome new faces out here soon

Hiya :)

Just a quick question, because I can't seem to find it on the Discord, but once you pick a city can you change it? I'm picking Shadow Isles because of Eve, but with her rework her lore will be updated, and there was mention a few months ago that the Shadow Isles part may change.

Thanks :)
You sure can :D Check out the About-us text channel for info on changing cities!
Come say hello! we organize fun events and there's always somebody to play with!
Come join us :D we like to play with new people!
Come say hello! We need more noxus members! :) look forward to meeting all of you!
